what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Multiple System Atrophy with Orthostatic Hypotension ?,"The NINDS supports research on disorders of the autonomic nervous system, including multiple system atrophy with orthostatic hypotension. This research is aimed at developing techniques to diagnose, treat, and prevent these disorders. Currently there are ongoing treatment trials of drugs to treat MSA.",NI
